name: Cosmodome
description:
Welcome to the Cosmodome, the greatest intergalactic sport in this side of the universe!


Cosmodome is a: wrestling inspired, Intergalactic, ship combat game where the audience decides who wins or loses.

Bash, blast and crash your way to victory with characters such as your average human, Dave, all the way to the jacked up and boneless Big Schlug.

  • Local 4 player carnage
  • Simple twin-stick + bumper control!
  • 4 different playable characters with their own personality, stats, and weapons to own the dome.
  • Approval based system where the winner is decided on the audience reaction!
